string.value: Something seems to be bothering Ryden. What could have happened? Go talk to #bRyden#k.

Ryden says that Lady Syl hasn't been able to get any sleep recently because of the loud ruckus being caused by pigs. He wants you to quiet down the pigs. #bHead left of Kerning City to the Construction Site and enter L Forest II through the portal located in the bottom right.#k Once you're there, eliminate the #rRibbon Pigs#k.
You eliminated the Ribbon Pigs so that Lady Syl can get some sleep.

Oh, what should I do?\r\n#L0##bWhat's wrong? Has something happened?#l\n#k
Lady Syl hasn't been able to get any sleep recently. The loud noise coming from the pigs are keeping her up at night. I have to remain at watch here, so why don't you go put those pigs to sleep?

Do you hear that? The pig noise is coming from across the Construction Site. Just take the portal at the end of the left side and then take the portal at the right most bottom. When you pass by a forest, you'll arrive at a place called #bL Forest II#k. You'll need to somehow sedate the pigs and make them fall asleep...
If sedating them doesn't do the trick, just eliminate about #r30 Ribbon Pigs#k. How you get them to shut up is up to you. Just get it done!
You must not care at all about Lady Syl.
So, were you able to make the Ribbon Pigs fall asleep? Ha! Eliminating them was probably an easier task, huh?
Well, thank you for your hard work. Have a nice drink of this potion.
Forget about making the Ribbon Pigs fall asleep, just eliminate #r30#k of them! Go towards your left and pass through the forest.
